chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
l2: Ordered.sort Label
l1: Ordered.sort Label
nodes: seq nid
this: nid
lab_disj: is_true (l2 != l1)

Goal:
is_true (valid V)

Premises:
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
V = W l1 nodes \+ W l2 nodes : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)
Notation seq := list
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
Notation valid := @PCM.valid
Module Ordered := Struct Record mixin_of (T : Equality.Exports.eqType) : Type := Mixin { ordering : rel T; _ : irreflexive ordering; _ : transitive ordering; _ : forall x y : T, [|| ordering x y, x == y | ordering y x] } Definition ordering : forall T : Equality.Exports.eqType, mixin_of T -> rel T. Record class_of (T : Type) : Type := Class { base : Equality.mixin_of T; mixin : mixin_of (EqType T base) } Definition base : forall T : Type, class_of T -> Equality.mixin_of T. Definition mixin : forall (T : Type) (c : class_of T), mixin_of (EqType T (base c)). Record type : Type := Pack { sort : Type; _ : class_of sort } Definition sort : ordType -> Type. Definition class : forall cT :
Ordered.sort = fun t : ordType => let (sort, _) := t in sort : ordType -> Type Ordered.sort is a coercion
send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
hook_type = heap -> heap -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop : Type
W = fun (l : Label) (nodes : seq nid) => (l \\-> gp l nodes, Unit) : Label -> seq nid -> world Arguments W _ _%seq_scope
gp = fun l : Label => GreeterProtocol^~ l : Label -> seq nid -> protocol Arguments gp _ _%seq_scope
validUn : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (f1 f2 : U), validUn_spec f1 f2 (valid (f1 \+ f2))
Actions.tryrecv_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)), (forall (l : Label) (n : nid) (t : nat) (m : seq nat), filter l n t m -> l \in dom W) -> Actions.action W (option (nid * nat * seq nat)) this
tryrecv_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)), (forall (l : Label) (n : nid) (t : nat) (m : seq nat), filter l n t m -> l \in dom W) -> Actions.action W (option (nid * nat * seq nat)) this
Heap.from = fun f : heap => match f with | Heap.Undef => UM.Undef (dynamic id) (fun k : ptr_ordType => k != null) | @Heap.Def hs ns => UM.Def (Heap.heap_base ns) end : heap -> UM.base (dynamic id) (fun k : ptr_ordType => k != null)
all_hooks_fire = fun (h : hooks) (l : Label) (st : nat_ordType) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) => forall (z : nat_ordType) (lc : Label) (hk : hook_type), Some hk = find (z, lc, (l, st)) h -> lc \in dom s -> l \in dom s -> hk (getLocal n (getStatelet s lc)) (getLocal n (getStatelet s l)) msg to : hooks -> Label -> nat_ordType -> union_mapUMC Label dstatelet -> nid -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop Arguments all_hooks_fire _ _ _ _ _ _%seq_scope
Heap.to = fun b : UM.base (dynamic id) (fun k : ptr_ordType => k != null) => match b with | @UM.Undef _ _ _ => Heap.Undef | @UM.Def _ _ _ hs ns => Heap.Def (Heap.base_heap ns) end : UM.base (dynamic id) (fun k : ptr_ordType => k != null) -> heap
Heap.ftE : forall b : UM.base (dynamic id) (fun k : ptr_ordType => k != null), Heap.from (Heap.to b) = b
nid = nat : Set
Actions.tryrecv_act_step_total : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)) (s : state), Actions.tryrecv_act_safe W s -> exists (s' : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)), Actions.tryrecv_act_step W this filter s s' r
msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
Actions.tryrecv_act_step_sem : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)), (forall (l : Label) (n : nid) (t : nat) (m : seq nat), filter l n t m -> l \in dom W) -> forall s1 : state, Actions.tryrecv_act_safe W s1 -> forall (s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)), Actions.tryrecv_act_step W this filter s1 s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
Heap.base_heap : forall f : {finMap ptr -> dynamic id}, all (fun k : ptr_eqType => k != null) (supp f) -> null \notin supp f
Protocols.Exports.nodes = Protocols.nodes : Protocols.protocol -> dstatelet -> pred nid
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : seq A | cons : A -> seq A -> seq A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments Datatypes.nil {T}%type_scope : rename Arguments cons {T}%type_scope x s%seq_scope : rename
not_hooked_by = fun (K : hooks) (l : Label) => forall (z : nat_ordType) (lc l' : Label) (st : nat_ordType), (z, lc, (l', st)) \in dom K -> l != l' : hooks -> Label -> Prop
rcv_trans : forall p : Protocols.protocol, seq (receive_trans (Protocols.coh p))
snd_trans : forall p : Protocols.protocol, seq (send_trans (Protocols.coh p))
Protocols.nodes = fun p : Protocols.protocol => let (nodes, _, coh, snd_trans, rcv_trans, _, _) := p in nodes : Protocols.protocol -> dstatelet -> pred nid
get_st : forall (w : world) (l : Label), seq (send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l)))
get_rt : forall (w : world) (l : Label), seq (receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l)))
getLocal = fun (n : nid) (d : dstatelet) => match find n (dstate d) with | Some h => h | None => Unit end : nid -> dstatelet -> heap
dom : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), cT -> seq K
Record TaggedMessage : Set := TMsg { tag : nat; tms_cont : seq nat } Arguments TMsg _%nat_scope _%seq_scope
all = fun (T : Type) (a : pred T) => fix all (s : seq T) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => a x && all s' end : forall T : Type, pred T -> seq T -> bool Arguments all {T}%type_scope _ _%seq_scope
tms_cont = fun t : TaggedMessage => let (_, tms_cont) := t in tms_cont : TaggedMessage -> seq nat tms_cont is a coercion

```coq
intros.
unfold V, W, gp, valid.
simpl.
rewrite validUn.
split.
* apply tryrecv_action_wrapper; intros.
  destruct (l2!= l1) eqn:E; [ | contradiction lab_disj ].
  apply all_hooks_fire; intros.
  apply tryrecv_act_step_sem; intros.
  apply Actions.tryrecv_act_step_total; eauto.
* apply tryrecv_action_wrapper; intros.
  destruct (l2!= l1) eqn:E; [ | contradiction lab_disj ].
  apply all_hooks_fire; intros.
  apply tryrecv_act_step_sem; intros.
  apply Actions.tryrecv_act_step_total; eauto.
Qed.

original: intros. unfold V, W, gp, valid. simpl. rewrite validUn. split. * apply tryrecv_action_wrapper; intros. destruct (l2!= l1) eqn:E; [ | contradiction lab_disj ]. apply all_hooks_fire; intros. apply tryrecv_act_step_sem; intros. apply Actions.tryrecv_act_step_total; eauto. * apply tryrecv_action_wrapper; intros. destruct (l2!= l1) eqn:E; [ | contradiction lab_disj ]. apply all_hooks_fire; intros. apply tryrecv_act_step_sem; intros. apply Actions.tryrecv_act_step_total; eauto.
